Key Match Events: Son Heung-Min scored twice and set up the third as South Korea handed China a 3-0 defeat in Shenzhen.
Son Heung-Min put South Korea in front with an 11th minute penalty.
Son Heung-Min added the second goal in the final minute of the first half with a header.
Son Heung-Min provided an assist for Jung Seung-hyun's goal three minutes from time.
